alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 12:45PM CDT until May 16 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1245 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marion, or near Meridian, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Meridian Station around 100 PM CDT. Toomsuba around 110 PM CDT. Lauderdale around 115 PM CDT. Kewanee around 120 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
